>
> I'v=
e listed a batch of two Manga for sale on Ebay to do some
> fundraising for=
 the costs of the forthcoming Journal of Japanese
> history. These are two =
manga that deal with the bakumatsu period. From
> the Ebay description:
> 
=
> These are two Japanese Bakumatsu era themed manga - "Sono Toki Rekishi
> =
ga Ugoita - Bakumatsu Edition", which covers seven historical events
> from=
 the Bakumatsu era of Japanese history, including the now
> legendary Ikeda=
ya Incident, in which the Shinsengumi killed and
> captured Choshu loyalist=
s at the Ikedaya inn, the assassination of
> Sakamoto Ryoma, and "The Last =
Battle of Hijikata Toshizo". The "Sono
> Toki" manga series is based on the=
 NHK television series of the same
> name which dramatically examines semin=
al moments in Japanese history
> from a purely historical perspective. This=
 manga was published in
> 2003, and is 504 pages.
> 
> The Second manga is =
"Hidamari no Ki", a fictionalized account of
> events during the Bakumatsu =
period by Tezuka Osamu, with stories about
> Henry Heusken, Townsend Harris=
, and other notable Bakumatsu era
> figures. This manga was published in 20=
02, and has 336 pages. There
> are some minor stains on the outside edge, b=
ut it is in good
> condition. Both manga have colorful dust jackets which a=
re in good
> condition, and are Japanese imports.
> 
>

link to the auction:
> http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=
=3D190123948646

ry related batch
